trans-unit.source: Defines the configuration element for a peer resolver.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerResolverElement"></xref> class.
Gets the configuration element for this peer resolver if it is a custom peer resolver implementation.

This property contains an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCustomResolverElement> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerResolverElement.Mode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerResolverMode.Custom>.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCustomResolverElement"></xref> that contains the configuration element for the peer resolver if it is a custom peer resolver implementation.
Gets and sets the type of the peer resolver represented by this configuration element.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerResolverMode"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the type of peer resolvder represented by this configuration element.
Gets and sets the referral policy for peer resolvers configured with this element.
<xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy"></xref> that specifies the referral policy for peer resolvers configured with this element.
